overview:
Kai was born in Germany in 1985. He did his Bachelor degree in Germany, Chile and Australia and is pursuing a part-time MBA at Loyola Marymount University. Kai worked for KPMG Advisory in Germany and Mercedes Benz Auto Finance in Beijing, China.
Kai is Co-Founder of Trolion Inc., an AI location based service provider developing an innovative and comprehensive marketing and business intelligence platform for the consumer and retail market. Kai is also Founder of the non profit organization Alpha Kai that is changing the interaction between students on campuses and groups of common interest.

degrees.subject: International Finance
degrees.institution: Frankfurt School of Finance and Management
